SEER.name: The Seer
SEER.description: The Seer is an interpreter for signs provided from above. They use countless methods to obtain knowledge and protect their village
SEER.abilities: See a players alignment each night
SEER.usage: Use `$see MEMBER` at night in a private chat with the Narrator to view a players alignment

GUARDIAN_ANGEL.name: The Guardian Angel
GUARDIAN_ANGEL.description: The Guardian Angel is a protector and guide to those he trusts
GUARDIAN_ANGEL.abilities: May protect a player each night
GUARDIAN_ANGEL.usage: User `$guard PLAYER` at night in a private chat with the Narrator to view a players alignment

ALCHEMIST.name: The Alchemist
ALCHEMIST.description: A practitioner of an ancient branch of natural philosophy, a philosophical and protoscientific tradition
ALCHEMIST.abilities: May save a player, may kill a player

HUNTER.name: The Hunter
HUNTER.description: The Hunter, a villager well versed in the arts of hunting, never seen with a dull blade
HUNTER.abilities: May kill a player shortly before dying
HUNTER.usage: Use `$kill PLAYER` after death to kill a player. Remember that this ability is only available shortly after death and becomes unusable if waiting for too long

CUPID.name: Cupid
CUPID.description: The god of desire, erotic love, attraction and affection and a son of Venus and Mars
CUPID.abilities: Can make two players fall in love on the first night. They can't live without each other and may win as the final pair
CUPID.usage: Use `pair PLAYER1 PLAYER2` on the first night to make two players fall in love

MAYOR.name: The Mayor
MAYOR.description: The highest-ranking official in a municipal government such as the Village
MAYOR.abilities: Has more voting power than the average Villager

APPRENTICE_SEER.name: The Apprentice Seer
APPRENTICE_SEER.description: An Apprentice to the divine Seer, knowledgeable enough to take their place, should something occur
APPRENTICE_SEER.abilities: Becomes a Seer once another Seer dies

KNIGHT.name: The Knight
KNIGHT.description: The Knight, holder of an honorary title of knighthood, powerful enough to withstand a nightly blow without falling
KNIGHT.abilities: Survives the first time being attacked

VIGILANTE.name: The Vigilante
VIGILANTE.description: The Vigilante, bringer of their own law
VIGILANTE.abilities: May kill two players per game, but at most one per night
VIGILANTE.usage: Use `kill PLAYER` at night in a private chat with the Narrator to choose a player to shoot

BOMBSHELL.name: The Bombshell
BOMBSHELL.description: The Bombshell, an explosive sleeper willing to bind their fate to that of their murderer

RESURRECTIONIST.name: The Resurrectionist
RESURRECTIONIST.description: The Resurrectionist, a divine believer able to cross the barrier, separating us from the deceased
RESURRECTIONIST.usage: Use `$resurrect PLAYER` at night in a private chat with the Narrator to revive the selected player

MAILMAN.name: The Mailman
MAILMAN.description: The Mailman, sole entity in control of every single piece of information
MAILMAN.abilities: May broadcast an anonymous message each day
MAILMAN.usage: Use `$title TEXT` and `$content TEXT` to forge a letter to be displayed on sunrise. Use `$reset` to delete your letter

ORACLE.name: The Oracle
ORACLE.description: The Oracle, blessed with the gift of infinite knowledge, cursed with never obtaining it themselves
ORACLE.abilities: Each night, may reveal a players role to another player. Neither player may be The Oracle
ORACLE.usage: Use `$reveal PLAYER1 PLAYER2` to reveal PLAYER1's role to PLAYER2 at sunrise

PRIEST.name: The Priest
PRIEST.description: The Priest, a divine believer empowered by their faith
PRIEST.abilities: Each night may use Holy Water to purify a player. This will kill the players if they are evil-aligned. Otherwise, The Priest will die instead
PRIEST.usage: Use `$purify PLAYER` to choose a player to purify

BROTHER.name: The Brother
BROTHER.description: The Brother, a Villager familiar with their siblings. They show an unconditional trust
BROTHER.abilities: Knows the identities of the other Brothers (if there are any)

MASON.name: The Mason
MASON.description: The Mason, a member of a guild, know since the fourteenth century
MASON.abilities: Knows the identities of all other Masons

FOX.name: The Fox
FOX.description: The Fox, bearer of a sixth sense, warning the Village of any evil intent
FOX.abilities: Each night may choose three players. If none of them are Werewolves, lose this role and become a regular Villager
FOX.usage: Use `$choose PLAYER1 PLAYER2 PLAYER3` to choose three players

TEACHER.name: The Teacher
TEACHER.description: The Teacher, bearer of knowledge, with influence over the whole village
TEACHER.abilities: The Teacher may not vote. Each day may choose up to two players. They are unable to vote that day
TEACHER.usage: use `$voteblock PLAYER` to choose players to block from voting. Only the last two uses will be executed

LORD.name: The Lord
LORD.description: The Lord, owner of a decently sized part of the village, with enough influence to convince large masses
LORD.abilities: Once per game may grace a player that has been chosen to be hanged
LORD.usage: Use `$grace` after a player has been decided to be hanged to grace them

MAFIOSI.name: The Mafiosi
MAFIOSI.description: The Mafiosi, a traveller of the underworld unknown to law and order
MAFIOSI.abilities: Knows the identities of other Mafiosi. Every night may choose one person to be killed
MAFIOSI.usage: Use `$vote` at night to choose a player. The player with the most votes will be killed

WITCH.name: The Witch
WITCH.description: The Witch, a dreadful practitioner of magic and witchcraft

UNIVERSAL.name: The Universal
UNIVERSAL.description: The Universal is a practitioner of diverse arts, suitable for many tasks. The Universal controls their own fate
UNIVERSAL.alignment: None, will change on first day
UNIVERSAL.usage: Use `$choose ROLE` to pick a role. This action has to be completed by the first night. If not, the Universal will become a regular Villager
